description:
(This game was made within 3 months for Binus Game Development Club 'Talent Group', further updates are on the way to improve on the game).

A new discovery within the Mariana Trench prompted the creation of "MT-1", an underwater research station open for all to see.

You used to work there, and something compels you to return one day. The station has changed due to decay, and something has gone horribly wrong...

Controls

WASD - Movement   
Space - Jump
C - Crouch
Left Shift - Sprint
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Aim
R - Reload
G - Grenade
1-4 - Change Weapons
E - Interact
Escape - Pause
V - Next Dialogue

Credits

Marvel Vetri Budiman - Supervisor
Sebastian Putra Cahyadi - Project Manager, Lead Programmer, Game Designer
Made Adistha Subaga - AI Programmer, UI Designer
Nicholas Laing Prabangkara - 3D Artist, 2D Artist
William Ananda Widjaya - Assistant Programmer
Yuka Maheswara - Lead Game Designer
